com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.swinginadapters

Class SingleAnimationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
        • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.swinginadapters.AnimationAdapter
          • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.swinginadapters.SingleAnimationAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SectionIndexer, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, ListViewWrapperSetter, Swappable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingBottomInAnimationAdapter, SwingLeftInAnimationAdapter, SwingRightInAnimationAdapter

    public abstract class SingleAnimationAdapter
extends AnimationAdapter
    An implementation of AnimationAdapter which applies a single Animator to views.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnimators

        public com.nineoldandroids.animation.Animator[] getAnimators(android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                                    android.view.View view)
        Description copied from class: AnimationAdapter
        Returns the Animators to apply to the views. In addition to the returned Animators, an alpha transition will be applied to the view.
        Specified by:
        getAnimators in class AnimationAdapter
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of the view
        view - The view that will be animated, as retrieved by getView().

      • getAnimator

        protected abstract com.nineoldandroids.animation.Animator getAnimator(android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                                 android.view.View view)
        Get the Animator to apply to the View.
        Parameters:
        parent - the ViewGroup which is the parent of the View.
        view - the View that will be animated, as retrieved by AnimationAdapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup).
